Review.Titre: You only get what you pay for.
Review.Contenu: Everyone needs to realize that ALL of these low cost cell phone carriers piggyback off the big major carriers, in other words, they sell a very small portion of their bandwidth to the low price carriers who then sell it to you at a lower price.  Think of it this way. The big carriers can offer you 90 percent of the bandwidth pie.  The other 10 percent sliver is divided up between all the low price carriers.  Its no wonder why after a few days or a week your service is throttled because you have used up all the bandwidth they have to offer.  Did anyone notice that all of the replies to the negative service reviews read exactly the same.  Its because there is nothing Patriot Mobile can do to solve the problem.  They only have a tiny part of the bandwidth pie to offer you and when it is gone, it is gone.  If all you need to do is send a few texts now and then or make a few phone calls to loved ones every month, it will probably work for you.  But if you do any heavy surfing of the web, your data will be used up very quickly because they only have a tiny portion to offer you.

Review.Titre: Phone echoes unless wifi is off.
I really wanted to like this company
Review.Contenu: I really wanted to like this company, but it wasn't to be. I purposely switched to Patriot from Verizon before taking a trip to Canada and Alaska because I needed the wireless hotspot feature while traveling. I also paid extra to have service in Canada, even though we were only there a couple of days. Only when I called (from my wife's Verizon phone) customer service from AK did they tell me they don't provide service there. The next big strike was when I started having trouble with my voice mail. When I called for help, I was told they don't support Visual Voice Mail for Android phones, even though they initially walked me through setting it up, and it had been working for months. Now they're saying they never supported it. I just placed an order to change providers to Pure Talk, who say they provide Visual Voice Mail and VM to text at no additional cost. Instead of using the T-Mobile network, they use AT&T's, and they're about $20 a month less than Patriot Mobile. If that one is no better than Patriot, I'll be going back to Verizon.

Their 9-5 hours are tough if you are a business and travel a lot. Forget about international calling. I do business in Canada and for some reason access keeps getting switched off. Each and every time I call tech they assure me its fixed. Love the concept, and employees are friendly once you get through but not reliable if you’re running a business.

The payments go in, as scheduled, every month, and the problem is basically a hardware issue, or a signalling issue, but the Biggest Problem is trying to get Service after peak hours, like at !0:30 pm. The phone states "offline" and if I am online, I get outside of my apartment, and lose the signal, my music stops, or I am not getting emails and text messages. When I come back home, it sounds like the 4th of July with all the messages, emails, and texts coming through, so I can read them. I am constantly trying to get a Reset to my phone, and I'm paying each month for service, but only have it half of the time. Calling Customer Service is a nightmare, as they're always too busy to answer my call. I cannot recommend Patriot Mobile to anyone with these conditions. I don't hate anyone that bad. Fix the Signals, and Fix the Customer Service Departments and you will have one satisfied customr here, and I can recommend Patriot Mobile to everyone I see!!

Something peculiar is happening with customer service.  When I had trouble receiving my SIM due to Fedex screwing up, I sent 4 emails in a week to Patriot Mobile (support@patriotmobile).  After not receiving 1 response I called them.  Not only did I not get an apology, but was told to go pick up the SIM card from Fedex myself.  After being with Patriot for 2 months, I cancelled my service today by calling customer service.  For Xmas, I received a new iPhone that was already with another carrier.  When I called Patriot to cancel and gave my reason, I was asked if I no longer needed the number.  After saying I didn't,  the line was disconnected mid-conversation.  No goodbye or telling me the line was about to be disconnected.  So, 2 cust svc reps have been kind of rude.  I wonder if the employees are not treated well?  Or, what I believe, some reps may lean left and hate the company & customers.

The people in customer service are friendly enough but unfortunately as much as I agree with the causes they support I can't have a phone service that doesn't have signal anywhere and that's not an exaggeration I'm a truck driver and only get signal in two major metropolitan areas in Georgia and the same in Alabama. That's not saying I only go to those areas I cover the entire region. I have no issues with the company or the people however if you want a service provider with network coverage then this probably ain't for you.

Review.Titre: Still can't use my phone in my home on wifi...
Review.Contenu: I can't use my phone near my home.  I called a number  of times in May and June.  The rep. said that they'll do this and that if the problem continues.  I still can't use my phone in or near my house, I have great wifi coverage and the phone still won't allow me to receive or make phone calls.I VERY disappointed.
The coverage is spotty. Many of my Apps do not work now.  I've been dooped.
Your support is very slow and usually takes multiple attempts to resolve issues.

I AM DONE!!! The first month with them I would have given them a 5 star hands down. As the months passed, it has steadily gotten worse and worse. My texts always have to be downloaded to read. My texts fail to send. Phone consistently acts weird. I'm not going to bore you with all the weird things my phone, my husband's phone, and my kids phones (who live across town) experience consistently. Just got home from traveling across the nation. Not able to call, text, use internet for over half the time. I'm so sick of this crap, I'm done!!! I don't care what the price is, when you can't use your phone, it's not worth it to me. I will be connected to Verizon or AT&T by tomorrow, I can guarantee you that! I came to patriot mobile with a paid off phone and an unlocked phone I bought from Samsung online. Like I said, it went from great, to horrible and all in between, in a matter of months. I'm done! There's a reason Verizon and AT&T are so big... they actually work!
Avoid. Not ready for prime time. So wanted to give business to a conservative company...but these guys don't have it together at all.

The company is solid. They have the same service as AT&T. The price was half of AT&T prices. All that was great. Easy to sign up and get a SIM card mailed. 5 star up to this point. NOW the issues start. The AT&T and other big companies give you a transfer # needed to switch over. It's good for 3 days. It takes 3 days to get the SIM card from Patriot. If it's a weekend transfer then note that they are closed on Sunday. Now you try to transfer the service and if you need ANY help then you are on your own. No one answers the phone. I emailed for 3 hours and only got confirmation that my request was received. I don't have 3+ hours for this. They need more help or a designated person for your acct that you only deal with them. They also could create an activation hotline. This is a major turnoff. Being ignored is frustrating. Now its 3 1/2 hrs trying.

Review.Titre: Patriot Mobile: Not Ready for Prime-Time
Review.Contenu: left Verizon to support a conservative company, only to find that I am left with no support options on a Sunday or Memorial Day. Occasional inability to send messages was an annoyance until this (2022) Memorial Day weekend (one of my busiest as a small business owner in a spring/summer tourist location) during which I have been unable to send or receive text messages (beginning early Friday evening) which are a staple of my appointment booking and rental confirmation procedures. As of today (Sunday), I have lost approximately $1200 in total revenue that normally funds my small farm operation for the first part of summer. I used the contact form on the website, thinking that at the very least it was monitored occasionally to address outages; sadly this was not the case.Back to Verizon, SIM on the way and transfer information provided. Sounds as though when I am able to call customer service, I want to have my new SIM in-hand and ready to go.I tried but, Patriot Mobile is not ready for prime-time or any type of business support.

I was tired of laying $110 a month for ATT so aim on Patriot Mobile. I signed up for 10GB plan which is $50. After a week, I got a message saying I’d used 75% of my data. I had 5GB with ATT and never once got this message. My activity is same. Yes. I listen to podcast a lot when I’m out. But this is ridiculous. Called and got no help. Lady said, “Well you’ll get throttled”. The ATT guy, when I signed up said “You’ll never use 5GB”. He was right. With ATT. I’m SO upset.

Review.Titre: STAY AWAY 3 months and have had nothing…
Review.Contenu: STAY AWAY 3 months and have had nothing but trouble. Very limited service hours and they can never fix have to put in a ticket taking 24-48 hours. STAY AWAY

Had AT&T since April 2022, but their reception was terrible, along w/their customer service. So, last week (May 17th) I switched to Patriot Mobile for their cheaper price. Paid $75 for the service + activation + taxes, and filled out necessary online paperwork to port my number over from AT&T. ATT sent me a text asking 'if it was me making the porting request,' and I replied 'yes.' Discovered early Friday, the porting did not go through, so called Patriot Mobile, and they set up a conference call w/them, me, & AT&T customer service. The only way AT&T would port my number was if Patriot Mobile canceled my order and resubmitted the porting request. After that mess was dealt with, I was eventually able to insert my new SIM card, but it only worked for about half a day. At 12:30 a.m. Saturday, my phone told me "No SIM Card Found," and it's been that way ever since, despite notifying Patriot Mobile through email of the problem on Saturday, and asking them to send a new SIM card. Patriot Mobile "customer service" did NOTHING, until I told them, Monday afternoon (May 23rd) that I was shopping for another service provider. They told me they wanted me to buy a second cell phone, buy service for it, then CALL THEM to 'fix the issue,' with my original phone. They don't have people reading their customer service emails. They use bots for that. I just purchased service with yet another cellular service provider, and am hoping that, within another week, this nightmare will finally be over. These people only care about the $$$ you give them, not whether you have service or not.Direct to Patriot Mobile: I am NOT new to cellular phones, and my cell phone works great; it was only YOUR SERVICE that sucked (since you shut off my SIM card). There is NOTHING you can do to 'make up' for your refusal to act when I asked you to send a new SIM card; that's on you. I am happy with my new service provider, Consumer Cellular.
The coverage that was promise  I have not seen that to be true.

Review.Titre: As a patriotic conservative American I…
Review.Contenu: As a patriotic conservative American I really wanted this to work for us. I was paying $150 a month to AT&T and Patriot Mobile was charging me 108 for the same shirts. But from the day we started this process I had nothing but trouble withour phones. At first they gave us T-Mobile cards but we were not getting good service with them at all. So they sent me AT&T Sim cards. But when we put them in my phone would not work at all! And when we tried to put the T-Mobile Sim card back in my phone still would not come on although my husband’s did. I will say every time we called I spoke to an actual person who understood me and I could understand them. And they all tried to help! Customer service is not a problem. But for some reason they could just not get my phone to work. The T-Mobile Sim card turned the phone on but I was unable to send texts or pictures to several members of my family. We tried the process three times! But my husband uses his phone for work and I am disabled and need to have a usable phone. So after 2 1/2 months we went back to AT&T which cost me a lot of money! Very disappointing! I will say it took more than four days to get all three phones on my plan to work. Patriot Mobile cannot seem to break the contact with our phone.
Your coverage and speed to access the internet for my phone is awful. Although I support a cause to use  Patriot mobile instead of Verizon, Verizon never had this issue but Verizon is woke.
Why is it so hard to set up a voice mail?  Why do you not provide easy access and support for voice mail?

Review.Titre: I'm not receiving a signal well
Review.Contenu: I'm not receiving a signal well, even when I have 2 or 3 bars of strength. won't load my data.
Moved from Verizon and expected similar service. Didn't happen. Would prefer to be a patriot customer but the service and support isn't there. Highly disappointed

Review.Titre: Not easy to manage your plans
Review.Contenu: Not easy to manage your plans. Forced to call in to do it. No mobile app from what I'm aware of.

Review.Titre: BEWARE. THE CUSTOMER SERVICE IS NOT GOOD.
Review.Contenu: UPDATE: I was finally able to reach a person at Patriot Mobile who actually offered to help me. Since I was still in a holding pattern with my previous provider and Patriot Mobile and had no phone service at all on that phone, I decided to go ahead and activate with Patriot Mobile after I was offered a free month of service. It really isn't a free month, since I had already paid the other provider for the month, and I lost that month since the number was ported. In any event, I have upgraded my review to 2 stars. Hopefully, as time goes on, this will be a good provider, but only time will tell. As a conservative, I wanted to support Patriot Mobile. I signed up and paid the fee. I had a trip scheduled to watch my grandson in his final college soccer game, and I began to receive emails telling me to activate with my new SIM card. Since I was out of state, I couldn't do that. I emailed the customer support email, apprising them of the fact that I was unable to activate until I returned home. I never received a response. Then, several days later, I received an email telling me they were going to start charging me, so I'd better activate now. I could see the writing on the wall that customer service (and customers) is not a priority with this company. I emailed and told them to cancel the order. More than a week later, they ported my number, and I was left with no service because I hadn't been able to retrieve the SIM card. I called the supposed customer support number. I reached technical support who told me that customer service didn't have a good phone number, but that there was nothing she (Jennifer) could do. Their system was going to charge me and port my number, regardless of my concerns or wishes. That's just how they do things. I contacted my previous provider, apprising them of the situation (that my number was ported despite my instructions to cancel the order). Hopefully, at some point, I will have service again. I have paid each of two companies for a month of phone service, and I have no phone service. I hope my previous company can straighten it out because Patriot Mobile is obviously not going to assist. I've specifically told them to cancel (for the third time) and not to charge my credit card again. We'll see what happens. I have a feeling it's going to be a long battle. Please be very cautious with this company and know that customer service is essentially non-existent.

Review.Titre: Not off to a good start
Review.Contenu: Not off to a good start.  I don't mind helping good cause so I looked past several other monthly subscriptions.  I contacted Patriot Mobile and signed up on Thursday the 3rd 2022 (after Net10 decided to screw up my account after over 10 years of loyalty-thats another review).I told the gentleman of the urgency, but he said I should have the sim card in a few days.   I could wait two days, but I told him the phone was needed for two step authentication and I needed it asap.  On Saturday I had not yet received anything from Fed-Ex.  I contacted Patriot and found out they had not yet sent out the card.   They waited until Saturday to begin the process.  Almost 2 days later.  Nevertheless, I finally received a tracking number from Patriot and was advised the card would arrive on Tuesday the 8th before the end of the day.  In the meantime, I received what I would call a "nasty gram" from Patriot that said in a nutshell " "Our records show that your new Patriot Mobile phone is not yet activated"  Per our Terms and Conditions, billing will start in 7 days..."Computer generated or not, that wasn't cool to receive.  As if I was in violation and it was all my fault.  I immediately sent a response and never heard back.  Tuesday evening came and went and no card.  It was later that evening I received another email that advised me there was a delay.  Ya Think!  They didnt know this before 4:30 at the end of the day?  Patriot never contacted me and said a word about weather. I received a second email advising the card will arrive on Thursday at the end of day.  We shall see.I contacted Patriot Mobile. She said they could not help what the weather had done.  I agree.  BUT, if they knew the weather was a factor WHY didn't they mention this during step 1?   I could have found another option for a month and come back.I think the company has started out with crummy customer service.  They should offer a free month for the headache involved. But when I mentioned cancelling all of this b/c of the headache, she was ready to that immediately.  After all, I am just a number and could be replaced, right?  I gave two stars because of what the company does. Otherwise it should be a one star.Update 02092022- My sim card arrived unexpectedly. I was told it would not arrive until 2-10-22.  I was unable to activate my phone even after following the instructions sent through email.  I called Patriot Mobile.  The refused to help me unless I gave them the last four of my credit card.  I have spoken to them two other times since this headache began and verified who I was with no credit card.  Now they refused to speak to me.  I told her I dont need to talk to anyone. I just want to activate my phone.  Does it get worse?

Review.Titre: Most of the time my cell phone does not…
Review.Contenu: Most of the time my cell phone does not work in my office or in my home
Service has been very bad as of late. Only 1bar

Review.Titre: Poor reception compared to my prior…
Review.Contenu: Poor reception compared to my prior carrier

They advertise as having no hidden fees, but only when you are ready to finalize your order do they mention an activation fee.I spent hours upon hours with a useless phone because the SIM activation would not work. There is no option for online chat and no way to send an "emergency" email.I decided to try my luck by sending a dm to their Facebook page. I actually heard from someone fairly quickly. At first I was told that a customer care rep would email me, but the person messaging me via FB ended up relaying between me and tech support for yet another several hours. In the end I had to do a factory reset on my phone in order to get the SIM activation to work. The FB message person did check with me a day or two later to see if things were still ok. The FB interaction is the only reason I gave two stars instead of one. So far my experience on the Sprint network is noticeably worse than on Verizon (was with them for years) with pauses and delays receiving data, despite living in the middle of an actual city.Honestly, if I could go back in time with the knowledge I have now, I would swallow the extra cost and stay with Verizon. Sad. Guess I will see how things go with Patriot for now, but it's like heading into a combat zone with that one dude you don't really trust. I really hated that.

Review.Titre: It's great if they ever get your phone working
Review.Contenu: I'm glad to be supporting a company that believes the same things I do. I'm trying to switch my wife's and I's phones over to them. At first they sent out the wrong SIM cards but began the porting process on my phone before that was figured out. So they had to send out new SIM cards which took 3 days meantime I did not have a phone because they had already began the porting process from my previous carrier. Fast forward 3 days to when the new SIM cards finally arrive I was able to get my phone set up after being on the phone with them  for at least an hour. Then we start the process on my wife's phone. The lady says that the port had started and wanted to hang up with me and said that she would call back when the port had completed. That was around noon and I never received a call back and now my wife's phone doesn't work either. I've called them twice today and the first person I talked to was nice and said to confirm the account info with the previous carrier and to call back when I had confirmed it so they could try porting the phone again. I got the correct info which was the same as the info I had given them before and called again. This was at about 8:20 PM and customer service ends at 8:30 PM so I was trying  to get my wife's phone working before she had to spend another night without it. I was able to get in touch with someone who I assume was about to get off work and they made sure I knew that they were not interested in getting my wife's phone working and were very annoyed I called them. I was interrupted multiple times and after I had given him the same account info as I had already given them before he said it was updated and would port the number again. I asked what the info they had was before because everything I had just told him was the same as I had already given. The representative was very irritated at my question and said he couldn't tell me.  I had had enough and knew I wasn't going to receive any more help because it was approaching 8:30 PM and all the person I was on the phone with cared about was getting off the phone with me. This has turned into a nightmare and I regret ever trying to join patriot mobile. It's been over a week that we haven't had both of our phones working and from the service I've received I don't see these issues getting resolved anytime soon.

I don’t feel like customer support is very strong.  It’s hard to get answers and often I don’t get the follow up I’m promised.  I have 5 additional lines on AT&T that I want to bring over but I can’t seem to get a straight answer on cost but I’m pretty sure it’s going to be more expensive.  Maybe that’s why.  Also, the phone service is supposed to be Verizon but I often lack service when people who have Verizon can still use their phone.  The only reason I want to bring my other lines over is that I feel it’s the right thing to do.

The customer service representatives are very courteous and professional which is great but the actual phone service is not up to par. I have several phonelines and hot spots and have issues with all of them. Voice mail only works half the time and the hot spot with 22G data don't perform well at all.
I like that Patriot Mobile is a conservative company. The service is not even close to what I had with AT&T phone and text are about the same but data is slow and unreliable

Hello, our phones don't work in many areas.  We live in skull valley, Arizona and the phones don't work right in town?  Our other phones worked in skull valley town.    They work in Prescott, Arizona in most places.  We bought those flip phones from you because our phones wouldn't work for you.  No cell phone works at the house, no reception for anyone.

To Whom It May Concern,My initial signing-up was a complete headache, lasted over several days. Also, wasn't very happy to see that your organisation had gotten political by siding with Israel. The companies name is "Patriot Mobile" not Israel Mobile. Can you focus your energies on all things America please? Now to the good part, I've been very pleased with the service and staff. I'm also paying less for getting more and that is greatly appreciated.

I like the conservative support aspect of Patriot. (1) But, my phone has AT&T emblazoned on it nonetheless, a woke company.  That means I am basically a woke AT&T customer, right? (2) Changing plans with Patriot is absurdly difficult. I have to call and do it on phone, rather than through website as all other carriers do.  Overall I'm satisfied but wish improvement in these two areas.

Review.Titre: Customer service is great however the…
Review.Contenu: Customer service is great however the service did not work for me.  It went out too much for me to be satisfied especially when traveling from one town to another!

Review.Titre: I LOVE that Patriot Mobile supports causes I believe in
Review.Contenu: I LOVE that Patriot Mobile supports causes that I believe in.  The service is pretty good most of the time.  There are times my husband, who is on a local network, has better service than I do, plus his plan is 64% less expensive than mine.  I don't believe the comparison is "apples to apples", but really the only reason I stick with Patriot is because of the support of causes I believe are extremely important.

Hi! Once my son reached someone, everything was expedient and went very well.  But as is most often the case when dealing with phone companies, it took a while for him to reach and talk to someone; he became very frustrated and hung up. He tried again a couple days later.  But we really do appreciate speaking with English speaking people whom we easily understand! That's a treat after some phone companies who must hire help over seas help who are difficult to understand.

Review.Titre: Don't understand why so expensive & it…
Review.Contenu: Don't understand why so expensive & it keeps going up. Every month the payment is higher & if u r for the ppl, why does it have to be so much. Figure out a way to bring the cost down. If u r patriots & white hats, u could charge less. Don't be puppets to ur black hat puppet masters.

I would rate 3.5.We have had a number of issues with the phones we purchased.  Had to change sim cards several times on both phones.  Frequent calls dropped.   The variety of phones available is small compared to other companies.  We like that you are a conservative company that support our values.  Customer service is excellent when we call for assistance.

Review.Titre: I LOVE WHAT PATRIOT STANDS FOR, MORE THAN THEIR SERVICE
Review.Contenu: My reception is unpredictable.  I am on Verizon which used to be very dependable  when I was on their program.  It seems as though I am being throttled when I should not be. Honestly I received better all around service when I was with Verizon,  but support Patriot because of their beliefs. By the way, it is kind of satisfying to see the offers Verizon is making to try to get me back. Bunches of "free" stuff, with may stipulations in the small print.

Raised the rates without notice. rate increased a dollar and change for a couple of months, when I called customer support to find out why, they didn't know and couldn't give an explanation. I would prefer to be billed but customer service said they didn't do any business by US mail.

personally I have had great customer service. Unfortunately two people I know have not and they are very angry and don't want anything to do with Patriot Mobile. I feel blessed to use Patriot Mobile because of who they support. But there's no one in my local area to help me with my phone if there's a problem Verizon and T-Mobile can't help me or AT&T because I don't subscribe through them. Yet Patriot Mobile dings off there towers. I can't stand that we have to use them. And I want Patriot Mobile to create their own towers. Sincerely Jamie Renninger

Patriot Mobile uses the AT&T and T-Mobile infrastructure. If you switch to Patriot Mobile and you have an T-Mobile phone, they might put you on an AT&T network. That happened me and my daughter and our phones wouldn't work in the house. I don't think the people in sales understand the concept, so expect to spend and inordinate amount of time with their customer service.

Review.Titre: First Amendment rights being taken away!!!!
Review.Contenu: I cant help but feel my First Amendment rights are being taken away by the fact that my 5G is being powered down after a certain amount of data usage so that an average of 8-10 days a month during my billing cycle, I can't use my phone to listen or view conservative viewpoints due to this. Which means why doesn't Patriot Mobile stand up to the bigger powers in the cell phone industry and say no your not powering down our clients data. Unlimited data means unlimited data.

Review.Titre: You can't talk to a human within a…
Review.Contenu: You can't talk to a human within a reasonable amount of time.  You don't have international calling at a reasonable price.  When in Mexico you have to be in a WiFi zone for the so-called international service to work.  IF you are in the U.S. you service is okay, but for a businessman it is inadequate.  I intend to move to another carrier.

I enjoy the fact that PM gives to charities I believe in as a Christian American but the cost needs to go down. My monthly bill has risen a little over $10.00 from my previous months with no explanation. My phone will say 5G and there will be no coverage. Some of my texts have been very late .It is also annoying that your company is not capable of wirelessly able to install Verizon on an iPhone 14 Pro Max.PM needs an app to be able to talk to customer agents and or pay their bill.Thank you,Ronald and Valerie Nelson

Review.Titre: I am pleased with the monthly service…
Review.Contenu: I am pleased with the monthly service price which was my initial reason switching to patriot mobile but my cell data is almost non existent without Wi-Fi. If I can’t get better cell data I’ll have to switch back.

Purchased ATT internet service for my home and noticed they included my cell service from Patriot in there billing system or MY ATT web portal?  Non issue normally but noticed after canceling home internet after 60 days and owing ATT 6$ ( fictitious charge btw) my cell service became extremely slow and began dropping calls.  After a lengthy discussion with ATT customer service, they removed the charge and magically service was back to normal.  I have to question in my case if Patriot is my provider with an ATT sim? Seems as though this may not be the case and gives concern over privacy.  At minimum service should NOT be impacted for 3rd party providers? Fully aware that privacy is impacted no matter the provider, but I pay Patriot Mobile, not ATT for my cell service.  Patriot should look more closely at this and provide lawful protection against this corporate overreach.

I like the “idea” of this service. However it is probably 40% more than the other providers if you compare data available to the cost for said data. How about you stop “giving a percentage of each dollar to charities” and lower the cost of the service. I don’t mind paying a bit more to have a US Only based customer service. But the data on my plan isn’t even close to what I COULD get with another provider. This has to change or I will HAVE to switch to another provider. Good service, every time I’ve had to deal with customer service it has been excellent. But I can’t afford $180+ a month (32 gigs TOTAL data COMBINED over 5 lines) when as a Veteran I can get 5 lines , unlimited data for $125 a month with the same service company I get with Patriot Mobile. I WANT to stay but the cost has already gone up $20 (same data) since I started in 2020. I can’t continue to do this in this economy.

Review.Titre: Your pricing is higher than most now
Review.Contenu: Your pricing is higher than most now.  Your currently using AT&T (which I don't like to support) as the carrier. I really don't see the benefit in having the service. Sadly, I'll be shopping.

Review.Titre: The only thing that’s changed with…
Review.Contenu: The only thing that’s changed with patriot is the price going up shortly after I joined. Lots of dropped calls, 10gigs of data for the price of others unlimited(high speed).  Excellent customer service.

In my opinion the service sucks. For instance I have unlimited everything but get throttled on data every month. If I have unlimited that means no restrictions so I should not be throttled. What’s the point of paying for unlimited if it’s restricted, might as well save money and buy restricted data.

Review.Titre: Love the basis of the company and…
Review.Contenu: Love the basis of the company and knowing my money is being used for things I support. Staff is kind. What doesn’t work for me is the international plan. You have to call each month on the exact day to continue it, which is a hassle when you are out of the country. And my experience is it does not work, at least not in South America. Patriot did refund my money, so that is fine, but we travel a lot and I am dreading having to buy a phone each time I travel. I am hoping they get this part figured out.
I don't appreciate the monthly throttling of service, even though I've supposedly got unlimited data and text.

Waiting was annoying. I still need to find a phone, I think.  To your credit, last time the person suggested bulbs and batteries.  I stopped in and they found something on the wall that worked. The NUU battery had swelled, they said. I am talking again. Usually your service help is effective, so I was willing to wait. My son had to go to work, so after a loooong wait, he took his phone and left.

Review.Titre: I love what it stands for
Review.Contenu: I love what it stands for and that my money is going to causes that support my values. Thank you.I think reception is not as good as the bigger phone service co we had before. Also we would love the option to lease to buy phones like the new iPhone.

Ever since we switched to Patriot Mobile, we can not receive pics and images through our texting app.  Pics have to be emailed.  We did not have this problem before.

Review.Titre: BAD, then GOOD: ask for troubleshooting!
Review.Contenu: BAD, THEN GOOD.BAD: Ported iPhones from AT&T and swapped SIMs Nov. 21, 2022. No activation. Repeated calls, repeated fails for > 24 hrs.GOOD: JASMIN was thoughtful enough to run the troubleshooting protocol on Nov. 22 ~ 6:10 p.m. The damn ICCIDs on file were wrong. Corrected. Activated in 5 min. The earlier reps didn't troubleshoot. Duh! So always ask about the troubleshooting protocol.

Review.Contenu: We love support this company but we don’t get great coverage where we are. Sometimes we’ll have full bars and not really get service. We have kept our account but would love for it to be better in our area.

First, I am very happy with the company as a whole, and the coverage.  Initially my coverage was poor, but I was given better coverage by using Verizon towers.  My only real issue is the poor quality of flip phone in the NUUF4L.  The buttons are very hard to push correctly, and many times what appears on the screen when texting is nothing like what I typed.  The phone is very difficult to learn, since no instructions are included.  I end up having to hunt and peck to find out how to do something.  I will have to ask one of my grandchildren to show me how to use it!  Why not get rid of this phone and try a Kyocera or some better flip phone?
Costs are kind of high.  Need to work to reduce them.

Review.Titre: Good company, but Substantial Growing Pains and Billing Issues
Review.Contenu: Good company, but has growing pains.  Cell service is fine and they were very helpful when the Sprint sale affected their cell service in rural Texas (switched me to the AT&T backbone).  But I have had continued problems with the billing.  Discounts are not applied correctly despite multiple calls to get the discounts corrected. This problem has reoccurred for several months.  Hope it is corrected in the next cycle.  Also have problems with the billing process itself.  They bill a single line charge for each month, with no breakdown of what makes up the monthly charge, so I cannot easily review the bill. Even though the email says to go to the website for details, the website says the bill breakdown is NOT AVAILABLE UNTIL THE FOLLOWING MONTH!  What other service does not allow you to review your monthly bill until a month after you pay that unsubstantiated amount?  None that I know of.  Finally, I was promised by a supervisor "Harold" to receive a call back from their billing manager "Rodney" about the above billing issues.  But to date I have never received a call back (I have google voice to capture any voicemails so there was no attempt to contact me).  That is disappointing.  I want to support and recommend a conservative company like this, but they have serious growing pains to address.
The monthly price keeps inching upwards.The app doesn't load even after reinstalling.

Review.Titre: The internet speed is slow all the time.
Review.Contenu: The internet speed is slow. I have to used a hotspot all the time because I ran out of Gs even with the hotspot on.

Review.Titre: NOT happy with new phone or your service
Review.Contenu: I have been a Patriot Mobile for about 7 years. Have Not had any problems UNTIL Recently. I am Very Unhappy with this service and am about to switch to a new carrier if I can't SPEAK with a LIVE Customer Service Rep TODAY!  I recently bought a Android Phone. I spoke LIVE with a cust. svc. rep.. I was considering 1 of two phones. A Samsung or a Motorola. The rep suggested the Motorola. I did not start using my new phone until this past Sunday. My Grandson set it up for me. I just today realized that I was sent the Samsung. I did NOT Purchase that one. Also I do NOT know how to use & don't have anyone to teach me. I want to send it back asap & get the new Flip Phone instead. HOWEVER. I have tried at least a dozen time today to reach customer. I dialed 611 several times but it would not connect me to a rep. I got message about not being a good number. I do not want to speak with a computer or messenger. I want to speak with a live person. TODAY! If not I will go to a new provider today!  I can't express to you how stressful & frustrating this has been to me. I used to love your cust. svc. I told everyone I knew to use your service. But you have changed. I don't feel like I can get cust. svc. any longer. Brenda Arnold

Nobody is perfect. The most troubling aspect is the signal in rural areas with regards to specific carriers.It’d be nice to be able to use whatever tower is nearby as I’ve heard another carrier has this ability. Also it’d be nice to finance's and insure through Patriot did in the old days. A few bad patrons shouldn’t spoil a good thing for the whole group.

I really like Patriot Mobile and knowing I'm supporting great causes.  The only negative experience I've had is that sometimes I don't get my voicemails in a timely fashion.  I am assuming it is an issue with Patriot Mobile as I have never had this happen before.  The longest has been about 15 hours before I received a voicemail that was left.

Great use of customer resources to maintain customer satisfaction.  But, why, why, why is there a cap and limit on data?  Why does it make any sense to promote "5G speeds" when those speeds become slower than dial-up as soon as the data cap is reached?  (3 weeks if I am cautious)  The internet, videos, pictures, and more are not getting smaller, and the direction should be to provide more and more data to access the internet.  I have called and asked several times for an explanation, which none has been given.  Logic dictates that since not everyone will use all their data there should be plenty to spare for everyone without any throttling.  This lack of response erodes any trust I have in your organization and will lead customers to find a better service provider.  Just let me know how I can help you do better.  Who is standing in your way?

Review.Titre: Switching to patriot was great decision!
Review.Contenu: Switching to patriot mobile was very easy. Because I live in the in a rural area, coverage is spotty and not as great as the big carrier I came from but overall the service just as good as the big carriers
I have very reliable coverage and the consistent pricing keeps me firmly on Team Patriot. The causes you support are in line with what I believe as well.

Review.Titre: Trust is very difficult to come by
Review.Contenu: Trust is very difficult to come by, nowadays, no matter what the connection is. So even with an individual getting to the point to where he or she can trust a corporation, like Patriot Mobile---even though you're not an AT&T or a Verizon or a Sprint---you're still a corporation. You're still "corporate" and the trust that we individuals (many of us) used to have with our American corporations---has been all but decimated. It's really sad. So, it's gonna take me time, as an individual, to trust you, as a company. This is especially to trust you as a company that values God, family and country. Even in that realm (governmenal leadership) we have been completely disappointed. Inside of just about all of the connections we can have with other human beings is gonna take prayer and---within God's Grace---a lot of work. That's for you corporate entities as well as for us everyday individuals. It's gonna take time to rebuild trust in America.

Review.Titre: Patriot Mobile when I signed up
Review.Contenu: Patriot Mobile when I signed up, gave me the worst cell tower in my area without giving me the option to choose which cell tower, out of the 3 major towers, T Mobile, ATT and Verizon. They chose TMobile for me knowing it was the minimal coverage in my area. I had to call them back, wait for a new sim card to Verizon, call to have it activated a couple of times. It wasn't as easy to sign up for as they make it out to be.

I am very glad Patriot Mobile is a company with responsible, positive family values. It is great to have an alternative to the woke values that seem to permeate most other companies. Keep up the good work!

Review.Titre: It took me several calls to get this…
Review.Contenu: It took me several calls to get this situation. Resolved. But we finally did it and now I am satisfied was very frustrated to begin with.

Review.Titre: I’m a patriotic person, so I love your service
Review.Contenu: Normally, the service is just fine once in a while I don’t get a very good signal when I’m traveling depending on where I’m at. I really wish you guys had an international phone plan. I travel often and before Patriot Mobile I had Verizon, which has a pay as you go. International phone plan, or you can buy a certain amount of time etc. if you guys had that it would be perfect.

Professional, courteous assistance in the setup process; the ability to choose from the three major carriers and change without a fee; and finally, the Christian foundation and donations underpinning the company's entire operation. The only problem was several different employees had no idea of the "download speeds" of your service at the various data plan levels. I had to go through several employees in different sections of the company before someone was knowledgeable and able to answer that simple question. All front-line agents need to be trained in this basic customer question. Other than that, excellent! A blessed holiday season to you all...!!!

I just love the fact that my money isn't going to left-wing agendas. Still, the service areas could be improved, but that may be due to the tower placement by T-Mobile. AT&T does not work at all at my home, and those were the only two choices available when I first set up service with Patriot Mobile. Overall, I am satisfied.

Review.Titre: I like the idea of Patriot mobile
Review.Contenu: I like the idea of Patriot mobile. I like not giving money to the problem. We do notice that the service isn’t performing as well when we’re not at home.

So far, the service is good. Eventhough I'm paying more than with my previous carrier, I want to support Patriotic businesses. There have been several occasions in the past few months since I've had the service that I haven't had service..Emergency Calls Only shows .A bother!

Like that I'm supporting conservative values, but frankly the cell service is not all it's cracked up to be. Sometimes I have great reception, and other times it is really bad!!
Your staff is very helpful, friendly and knowledgeable. I like the fact that you are not a WOKE company. From what I've seen you are just the opposite.
Patriot’s customer service and rates are great. My only complaint is very poor cell signal where I live. I live in rural Hopkins County with very poor reception.

But for the most part all is well and the customer support is fantastic. Thank you! Oh and I really appreciated the news letter of all the things pm has done with their funds. Way to go.

Nice, informative and helpful. They use existing carriers for the SIM cards. I have T Mobile, it works okay but there are a few weak areas. I like the option to drop out without penalty if I am dissatisfied.

Review.Titre: Service is awesome no complaints about…
Review.Contenu: Service is awesome no complaints about that but there is another good (I've been told) provider that is about $150 less a year.  Doesn't sound like much but I would like to save $150.  I will probably be switching.  Sorry.
Had difficulty with reception and downloaded  times when we traveled to Kankakee IL.
Once and a while,  not often. loose AT&T tower signal but comes back, always better than no  Verizon signal at our location via prior provider.

Staff was kind and helpful, giving me clear information on my options and being patient as I made a decision. One error was a missed step that limited an important capability for a few days, but they resolved it immediately when I called back for help.
Prices are reasonable. The people are easy to talk to and able to help when you call. The only downside is that service using the T-Mobile provider is very limited in more rural areas.

Review.Titre: Voice mail has not worked since we…
Review.Contenu: Voice mail has not worked since we switched. Internet  is also much slower (or unable to connect altogether) when traveling.

The only negative I would give is, you need to have a little better selection on your phones. I usually have to buy my phone elsewhere because you don't have the one I want. Also, have a little better multi phone discount. Other than that, you are a great phone company to work with, and have great service.

Review.Titre: I appreciate the causes you support
Review.Contenu: I appreciate the causes you support, your values. I didn’t give you a perfect score because sometimes my coverage is spotty. But I still appreciate you!
Had very good customer service. Was disappointed in NOT porting my old number which has lead to numerous inconveniences to me SINCE everything was tied to my old number.

Review.Titre: I love what this company stands for!
Review.Contenu: I love what this company stands for. I support their efforts 100%. Being a long time flip phone user, I am not enjoying my very recent switch to a smartphone. not yet, anyway. My son suggested that part of the problem I was having was that I didn't have a data plan. Bingo! Patriot Mobile is addressing this as I write this. On the darker side. My last phone was a Sonim XP3900 Plus. This phone was very difficult to learn to use as I am a big time texter. This is the wrong phone for that if you don't want to jump through a LOT of hoops. Patriot Mobile really did very little to help me with that. I ended up experimenting and figuring it all out the HARD way. Most of what I had to do was NOT in the manual. In fairness, that's really Sonim's fault, not Patriot Mobile's, except that  they are the ones who sold me the phone. I had a Love/Hate relationship with that phone from the moment I opened the box. I hope to have better luck with my new iPhone SE/3. :-]
Good Service all around.  Customer Service is always helpful, and the general service is overall good.  I would like some better connectivity in certain locations, but you can't win them all.

Starting off was a little rough. It took a few different sim cards before one worked right. Ever since, though, service has been fine, no problems. The app sucks, though. I have never been able to get it to work and have completely given up on it. The regular website works fine if you need it. All in all, I get the same service that I had with AT&T for half the price, so I am happy.

I love the service. It meets my needs for a phone, which is mainly to talk and text only. The flip-phone that I opted for (it was "free") does have a few draw-backs. The physical buttons do not always work. A bit frustrating but it gets the job done eventually.
True to their advertisement, Had to get 2nd Sim card for my phone. No  extra charge, just a different Sim card.

I'm rating 4.3 stars overall for customer service, billing, plans and phones offered, network coverage and reliability. Verizon is the gold standard in my opinion for mobile phone service except if you upgrade to a more costly plan in Verizon there is no going back to the lower cost plan because it becomes unavailable almost the moment I upgraded. Patriot keeps the entry level plans available to everyone so as their needs change they can move in and out of whatever plan is most suitable for their current situation. Patriot offers a very nice referral plan ability that creates a win win situation for old and new clients. If they would streamline the referral process a bit more, and continue to invest to improve their website then I believe it's almost guaranteed Patriot would receive more 5.0 star ratings. I love that Patriot Mobile promotes life, personal responsibility, and freedom. Many companies have colluded with the federal and state governments to give them more influence over Americans than what the Constitution permits.  Patriot Mobile doesn't play that game.

Review.Titre: I am very happy with Patriot Mobile
Review.Contenu: I am very happy with Patriot Mobile. The service is just as good as any other mobile service I have had in the past. The only complaint I would like to address is the Wi-Fi service. I had true unlimited Wi-Fi service with my previous plan. With your service I would have to pay more money to get what I was getting before. Your service slows down after a certain amount of usage and this happened pretty quickly. If it were not for the fact that I have retired from work now and no longer need to use my Wi-Fi at work, I would not have kept this service. I am striving to be supportive of a good company. Just being honest. Thanks!!!
Great customer service and love the values of the company!  Wish there were more phone options and ways to upgrade phone every couple of years at a discount.

Review.Titre: I really love the customer service
Review.Contenu: I really love the customer service. Excellent.Everyone is really helpful. The cost is great too. My phone service is mostly good. Spotty at times though. Texting is generally good, but half of the time, if I try to send a photo, it won't go through. Overall, I'm glad I switched from evil AT&T.

Customer service is great, reception is great - all over the western US.  I wish that I got my VMs and texts more quickly. 80% of the time VM's arrive the day after they were sent. Not good for my business!
Very happy with this company. Good service noProblems. Their beliefs are similar to mine. Nice to have a company that believes in the right issues

Review.Titre: Initial sign up was very easy and…

So I had no service for several days until getting my second SIM cards, and then I had to borrow another phone and sit in a hot car for about 45 minutes waiting for customer service to get me connected. Review.Titre: IN THE BEGINNING YOUR CUSTOMER SERVICE…
Review.Contenu: IN THE BEGINNING YOUR CUSTOMER SERVICE DEPT WAS SAYING, IM SORRY WE CANT OR IM SORRY THIS OR THAT & IT WAS UNPROFESSIONAL, YOUR STAFF WAS COURTEOUS AT ALL TIMES TO ME . Almost every time I had any customer service experience with AT&T, it was poor and always took 60 minutes or more!  The customer service rep with PM (Zach Schmidt) was pleasant, responsive, spoke clear english, and was able to completely meet my needs.  Thank you Patriot Mobile!!

Review.Titre: An easy, helpful and friendly staff
Review.Contenu: I had to call 2-3 times during the initial setup and I ended up talking to live human beings. All spoke perfect English!  I was not talking to someone who I could barely understand who could have been in India or any number of other countries the way most corporations have gone. Also, there was no massive robot bouncing me from one place to another trying to keep me from talking to a human being. Lastly, it is great to know my money is going to a company who shares my values!

Review.Titre: I'm 100% on board and fully support…
Review.Contenu: I'm 100% on board and fully support everything that Patriot Mobile is and stands for! I will NEVER go back to this other companies, no matter how hard they dangle their carrots! Patriots and conservative Christians love America and Patriot Mobile for their love back! BRAVO ZULU!

Review.Titre: When we went with Patriot mobile their…!
Review.Contenu: When we went with Patriot mobile their customer service is outstanding and above. Their friendliness and knowledge made us feel they cared. The reason we went with Patriot mobile and what we appreciate is that they do not give money to organizations that go totally against our beliefs, the Christian values take center stage and that means everything to us. Thank you for not donating money to organizations such as planned parenthood. We do not subscribe to AARP either for the same reasons they sell out our Christian values morals and ethics.

First of all service- I have never been without service anywhere i go.  Second- cost.  Your prices are the best deal ever.  Most of all, I know that my carrier is On My Side, supporting only conservative causes and the values and morals I hold dear.  Thank you Patriot Mobile for holding the line!!

Review.Titre: I switched and I have no regrets
Review.Contenu: I switched from that company that rhymes with Horizon two years ago.  For one thing, I’ve saved about 25% to 35% on my charges.  I haven’t noticed much difference in coverage.  Sometimes it’s worse in one location than my prior carrier, sometimes it’s better in another.  The most important thing is knowing that I am no longer contributing to the decay of society by having a portion of my fees used to support causes that run contrary to my worldview.

The service has worked great for the year or so that I’ve been a customer. I have the higher data package which is about the same price as other companies unlimited plans. I listen to Audacy and SiriusXM apps while traveling and haven’t hit the data limit yet.

I greatly appreciate the service provided. Do not have any issues. However, I would love to see a greater phone selection i.e. secure phone, military style. I love the community outreach and the faith principles to which Patriot Mobile stands. We need more companies like Patriot Mobile standing on truth.

Whenever I call, the rep who answers is very polite and pleasant to deal with. I believe the reps are also American so no communication issues - easy to understand. So far, I have had no problems with my wireless service and I'm very glad I switched.

Review.Titre: The money you spend with Patriot Mobile goes towards conservative values
Review.Contenu: When I have self generated issues, these representatives have been polite, they listen and fix my mistakes. No extra charges. No hassles or impatience.  They respect each of their customers. Best customer service I’ve had in many years.

I trust Patriot Mobile, unlike other companies in the US. I also love the fact that they are contributing to causes I support. They also were very professional and polite. Nice to know there is a company still out there somewhere with these values.

Review.Titre: I see no difference in my experience…
Review.Contenu: I see no difference in my experience with my android phone than when I had ATT. Except for the monthly payments.!!! I still phone, text, message. But I also read my books, check information on the internet, order products online, listen to sermons and music, and occasionally stream a movie if I'm using my WiFi.

Outstanding customer service. Our service is somehow better even with the same carrier(doesn't make sense to me either). Good prices and ability to introduce others and get a discount on you bill. Very pleased with Patriot Mobile and their values closely match my own as far as I can tell.
Customer service is always good. Prices are straight forward & honest without any price gouging. However, it would be great if they offered an unlimited data plan like all the other carriers.

After fighting with ATT for two weeks, the wonderful people at Patriot Mobile took care of everything.  I love picking up the phone and getting help from an English speaking person right away or almost right away.  I also love everything they stand for.

Customer service is extremely friendly and helpful. Even though we live in a remote area where service can be spotty with other carriers Patriot service has not failed us. Both of my son's recommended Patriot and we're glad we switched over.

Review.Titre: I came over from T-Mobile and at the…
Review.Contenu: I came over from T-Mobile and at the very minimum. I have had the same or better service in that. I also have the comfort of knowing where my money goes. The wonderful organizations that you work with and don't eat too is a big draw for my family and myself. I've had not one thing to say negatively about this wonderful company. After another contractor 2 is completed with a few of my family members, I'll be bringing more over to the family.

Switching from Tracfone to Patriot Mobile was a breeze (on the Patriot Mobile end).  I spoke with 4 or 5 of your reps and each and every one was patient, courteous, helpful, and American!!  The only accent I ran into was a pleasant southern one.  And, the service has been excellent. And, it's a bonus to know that you all have the same beliefs that we do.  Keep up the good work!

Review.Titre: From the first time I called Patriot…
Review.Contenu: From the first time I called Patriot Mobile I was hooked. The friendly professional service received was a breath of fresh air. Looking forward to working with Patriot Mobile in the years to come. I better not forget to mention the savings, a lot easier on the pocketbook. Thank you Patriot Mobile for all you do!

Patriot Mobile didn't robo-call me. I called them for information. When my plan with sprint-destroyed-by-tmobile ended, I contacted Patriot Mobile again and they handled the transfer of my three phones. Customer support was pleasant to work with. I have recommended them to many of my friends. Oh, and they saved me money!

Customer service is very good.  The people that I talked with spoke perfect English with no noticeable accent that made it difficult for me to understand.  The next best aspect of their customer service was, that the lady that I spoke with seemed to care about the company she was a part of, and took pride in their service.  So, Patriot Mobile is doing something right with regard to their company's culture.

Customer service is top notch! I wanted to switch to a company that supported the pro-life movement, what a bonus to find a company that was not only Christian, but patriotic, conservative and more. Listening to Christian music whole on hold? Closed on Sundays because it's a family day? Yes!

I really appreciate the flexibility I have with Patriot Mobile.  Thru Patriot, my husband has Verizon, but it did not allow for good service on my phone, so I have AT&T, both thru Patriot Mobile.I really like their friendly, willing to help customer service.  And it’s a US based company 🇺🇸

I’m so glad I switched! The cell service is the same or better than before, there have been no price surprises, we save $40 a month compared to our previous service. The customer service can at times be a bit of a wait but I just do the call back option. And once you do talk with someone, they are extremely kind and courteous and they actually want to help! Not just another cog in a machine. And supporting causes I believe in instead of big telecom takes the cake!

Review.Titre: I like the fact that Patriot Mobile is…
Review.Contenu: I like the fact that Patriot Mobile is a Christian Conservative company that supports my values. Also the service is awesome! I like the fact that if your reception isn’t good they will switch you to another provider that will be better at no charge and you are not locked into a contract.

Ive been with you for several years now, loyalty is important. Alberto was a great help and made my predicament a nothing burger.. I also appreciate that I got the new phones quicker than expected. I tell everyone that I know how excited about having a cellphone company that exhibits my beliefs. My Old Pastor use to always say that "Talans" are still important.

I signed up for the Pay It Forward program. It was quick and easy. The gentleman was very nice and understanding of my time. It took 45 for a call back (I’m glad a company like this is busy). I just walked out the door to leave work. The transaction was completed quickly. Thank you for supporting necessary causes and allowing us to be a part.

Your customer service has been great when needed and I haven't needed it often. You support causes I care about and not causes that are contrary to my christian beliefs. Phones have been good but selection is limited. I recommend Patriot Mobile to anyone and everyone I can.
Great cellular service and the absolute best customer service in setting up my account and phone.  And did I mention the great rates.  I will not switch to another company again.  I found my home!!

She. I was trying to set up a line for my brother in a nursing home in another state from where I live, Patriot Mobile was most helpful, my brother was not cooperating because it was not what he was accustomed to, but a stroke had changed the everything for him.  I had been a Patriot Mobile customer before that and was, as I am still, most satisfied with the service.  Further, I like that our monies support Veterans',  and conservative, causes.

Review.Titre: I travel from Northeast Kansas to…
Review.Contenu: I travel from Northeast Kansas to Tyler, Tx 4-6 times per year.  I travel in all kinds of weather.  So far, I have had now problem with my maps not being with me the whole way.  I have confidence in them which is very comforting to me.Neg--I did have one incidence in Ks at night.  We were under heavy general cloud cover and my directions became muttled. I had a difficult time finding my way out of a rural neighborhood.  Has not happened since.

Switching over would have been easy, but I had issues switching over with my old cell phone - 3g and 6 years old. The customer service representative was very helpful.  They sent me two sim chips depending on my local service. They walked me through the setup.  Ultimately, I had to get a new phone and the setup was a snap.  I am not a phone hog and missing 3 days was not a big issue. Service is great in suburbia Philadelphia. It would have been helpful if they would have a list of compatible phones, but I appreciated that they tried to work with my old phone until the writing was on the wall.

Review.Titre: I'm very pleased with Patriot Mobile
Review.Contenu: I'm very pleased with Patriot Mobile.  The transition was seamless, and the service has been very good.  I especially like that Patriot Mobile funds worthy causes that line with Christian values.Thank you.

Review.Titre: A real person on the phone
Review.Contenu: A real person on the phone, Christian music on hold, and the sincere courteous nature of your service personnel was sooooo refreshing!  Thank you.

Review.Contenu: When we reached out to you to relate our issues with ability to get good reception in some areas, you resolved this by sending new sim cards for our phones and they are now working beautifully!  Thank you!

Review.Titre: Answered my question quickly and even…

Review.Contenu: Patriot Mobile provides real people to help when you have an issue. Their pricing is great and customer service is friendly and helpful.

Review.Titre: I love everything about this company
Review.Contenu: I love everything about this company. The service is great and customizable. The people are so friendly and actually care about the service they provide. The prices are almost unbeatable.

I very much appreciate Patriot Mobile’s dedication in supporting the Christian values and Biblical moral standards upon which our country, Constitution, and laws were founded. I routinely select companies with similar values and business practices for my healthcare needs, banking, phone service, and other services. I’m very pleased with Patriot Mobile‘s service and have no desire to switch.

Review.Titre: My switch over to Patriot Mobile was a seamless process.
Review.Contenu: My switch over to Patriot Mobile was very smooth and the person that helped me was very good to work with. We had to change my carrier after a while due to weak signal and all went well and service now is good.

Review.Titre: I joined Patriot because of their Christian and conservative values…
Review.Contenu: I joined Patriot because of their Christian and conservative values and donations to worthy causes related to those values.  Its great to have a phone service that is not operating on a "woke" mentality!

Review.Titre: I have no complaints at all

Easy to switch. Customer service is professional. Reasonably priced. No issue with range. Very happy to have switched.
